It is based on the 'fireMultiNode.xml' node configuration file.</description> <primitives> <instruction> <definition><instr:instruction xmlns:instr="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/instruction" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu instruction.xsd"> <name>pongiConveyMessageByText</name> <id>0x13500000</id> <ontologyURI>http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/onto/pobicos#conveyMessageByText</ontologyURI> <description>Convey (communicate) some message by using textual display</description> <arguments> <arg> <label>TextualMessage</label> <ontologyURI>http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/onto/pobicos#TextualMessage</ontologyURI> <type>uint8_t*</type> <description>Textual message (a vector of characters); string</description> </arg> </arguments> <result> <type>void</type> </result></instr:instruction></definition> <implementation xlink:href="../../middleware/components/resources/implementation1">implementation1</implementation> </instruction> </primitives></res:resource></resource> </resources> <descriptors> <descriptor><descr:descriptor xmlns:descr="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/descriptor" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu descriptor.xsd"> <name>PONGO_LOCATION_BATHROOM</name> <id>0x52120000</id> <ontologyURI>http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/onto/pobicos#Bathroom</ontologyURI> <description>Bathroom - a place which contains facilities for washing (baths, ..), water closet, etc.</description></descr:descriptor></descriptor> <descriptor><descr:descriptor xmlns:descr="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/descriptor" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu descriptor.xsd"> <name>PONGO_PRODUCT_MONITOR</name> <id>0x16110000</id> <ontologyURI>http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/onto/pobicos#Monitor</ontologyURI> <description>A monitor - a device able to display computer screen</description></descr:descriptor></descriptor> </descriptors></node:node>
